content.text: Match ends, Hamburger SV 3, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1.
Second Half ends, Hamburger SV 3, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1.
Foul by Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Gojko Kacar (Hamburger SV) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Ivo Ilicevic (Hamburger SV) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Kerem Demirbay.
Attempt missed. Jacques Zoua (Hamburger SV) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Milan Badelj.
Offside, Hamburger SV. Heiko Westermann tries a through ball, but Jacques Zoua is caught offside.
Foul by André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Gojko Kacar (Hamburger SV) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Hamburger SV. Jonathan Tah replaces Dennis Diekmeier.
Goal!  Hamburger SV 3, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1. Kerem Demirbay (Hamburger SV) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Milan Badelj.
Offside, Hamburger SV. Heiko Westermann tries a through ball, but Jacques Zoua is caught offside.
Ivo Ilicevic (Hamburger SV) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Milan Badelj.
Foul by Filip Daems (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Dennis Diekmeier (Hamburger SV) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Tolgay Arslan (Hamburger SV) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Milan Badelj.
Substitution, Hamburger SV. Matti Steinmann replaces Artjoms Rudnevs.
Foul by Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Heiko Westermann (Hamburger SV) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Hamburger SV. Tolgay Arslan tries a through ball, but Artjoms Rudnevs is caught offside.
Nico Brandenburger (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Petr Jirácek (Hamburger SV).
Attempt blocked. Petr Jirácek (Hamburger SV) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Artjoms Rudnevs.
Corner,  Hamburger SV. Conceded by Tony Jantschke.
Foul by Ivo Ilicevic (Hamburger SV).
Nico Brandenburger (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Patrick Herrmann (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kerem Demirbay (Hamburger SV).
Tolgay Arslan (Hamburger SV) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
René Adler (Hamburger SV) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Patrick Herrmann (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Hand ball by Kerem Demirbay (Hamburger SV).
Substitution, Hamburger SV. Kerem Demirbay replaces Rafael van der Vaart.
Substitution, Hamburger SV. Ivo Ilicevic replaces Marcell Jansen.
Substitution, Hamburger SV. Petr Jirácek replaces Zoltán Stieber.
Second Half begins Hamburger SV 2, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. André Hahn replaces Raffael.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Amin Younes replaces Julian Korb.
First Half ends, Hamburger SV 2, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1.
Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Nico Brandenburger.
Attempt missed. Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Patrick Herrmann.
Foul by Artjoms Rudnevs (Hamburger SV).
Roel Brouwers (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Rafael van der Vaart (Hamburger SV).
Bilal Sezer (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Marlon Ritter (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Thorgan Hazard.
Goal!  Hamburger SV 2, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1. Rafael van der Vaart (Hamburger SV) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner.
Marlon Ritter (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tolgay Arslan (Hamburger SV).
Corner,  Hamburger SV. Conceded by Nico Brandenburger.
Foul by Marlon Ritter (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Gojko Kacar (Hamburger SV) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Hamburger SV. Tolgay Arslan replaces Per Skjelbred because of an injury.
Dennis Diekmeier (Hamburger SV) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Per Skjelbred (Hamburger SV) because of an injury.
Foul by Per Skjelbred (Hamburger SV).
Marlon Ritter (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Bilal Sezer (Borussia Mönchengladbach) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Marlon Ritter following a fast break.

Goal!  Hamburger SV 1, Borussia Mönchengladbach 1. Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner.

Goal!  Hamburger SV 1, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Jacques Zoua (Hamburger SV) header from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Rafael van der Vaart with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Hamburger SV. Conceded by Tony Jantschke.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
